meanings.definition: To remove a check mark or tick from a box or option.
meanings.sent1: Please uncheck the box to turn off notifications.
meanings.sent2: Don't forget to uncheck the items you no longer need.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally uncheck the wrong box and missed an important message.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to uncheck the box opened up a world of new possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The action to uncheck the box felt like a weight lifted off her shoulders.

meanings.definition: To cancel or deselect an item on a list or menu.
meanings.sent1: You can uncheck the box if you change your mind later.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to uncheck any unwanted items before proceeding.
meanings.sent3: I uncheck the wrong item and ended up ordering the wrong size.
meanings.sent4: His choice to uncheck the option led to a smoother experience.
meanings.sent5: The ability to uncheck items gives you more control over your selections.
